metadata.title: CVE-2022-20369 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In v4l2_m2m_querybuf of v4l2-mem2mem.c, there is a possible out of boundswrite due to improper input validation. This could lead to local escalationof privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction isnot needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroidID: A-223375145References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
